title: 87/105/Euratom: Commission Decision of 6 November 1986 concerning the conclusion of an Agreement for cooperation in the field of controlled thermonuclear fusion between the European Atomic Energy Community and the United States Department of Energy by the Commission for and on behalf of the said Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 6 November 1986
concerning the conclusion of an Agreement for cooperation in the field of controlled thermonuclear fusion between the European Atomic Energy Community and the United States Department of Energy by the Commission for and on behalf of the said Community
(87/105/Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Agreement for cooperation in the field of controlled thermonuclear fusion between the European Atomic Energy Community and the United States Department of Energy shall be concluded on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement (1) is appended to this Decision.
The President of the Commission is empowered to designate the person authorized to sign the Agreement for the purpose of committing the European Atomic Energy Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 November 1986.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Vice-President
(1) Signed on 15. 12. 1986.
